description_for_human: Plugin knows and understands the what, why and how behind all statistics in the NBA including up to date live stats. Get the context behind the numbers vs simply skimming through box scores.
description_for_model: Plugin knows NBA stats, news, opinions and analysis including all quantiative and qualitative data. It is able to retrieve all up to date NBA statistcis including opinions to provide the user with the context behind the data.
